data_sources.description: Contains wine reviews, including ratings, prices, taster names, and geographical information.

data_variables.name: reviews
data_variables.description: A DataFrame that holds the wine reviews data imported from the CSV file.

data_variables.name: review_points_mean
data_variables.description: Mean value of the wine points (ratings) used for normalization.

data_variables.name: review_price_mean
data_variables.description: Mean value of the wine prices used for normalization.

flows_to: Used for generating summary statistics and unique value counts
Transformed using map() and apply() methods for re-mean calculations
Used to normalize points in the reviews DataFrame
Used to normalize prices in the reviews DataFrame
